mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bm_basket ( menuName, menuPrice, storeIdn, userIdn ) VALUES ( #{menuName}, #{menuPrice}, #{storeIdn}, #{userIdn} )
mapper.select: SELECT A.*, (SELECT storeName FROM bm_store WHERE storeIdn = A.storeIdn) AS storeName, FORMAT(@ROWNUM := @ROWNUM+1, 0) AS rowNum FROM (SELECT basketIdn, menuName, menuPrice, storeIdn FROM bm_basket WHERE userIdn = #{userIdn} AND storeIdn = #{storeIdn} ORDER BY regDate DESC LIMIT 18446744073709551615 ) AS A, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0 ) AS B
SELECT SUM(menuPrice) FROM bm_basket WHERE storeIdn = #{storeIdn} And userIdn = #{userIdn}
